attributes.action: bring back loco hauled trains with class 37 locos on the southport wigan line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to bring back 7 coach trains on the manchester to southport line to stop overcrowding on this very busy railway line , people pay good money and should get a good service

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
